item.title: 堪萨斯城联储主席谈杰克逊霍尔会议上大家将谈论的话题
item.description:
又到了一年中的这个时候。【原文：

It's that time of year again.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：美联储施密德谈杰克逊霍尔会议（播客）
item.description: 又到了杰克逊霍尔（Jackson Hole）时间，货币政策领域最杰出的人士将在怀俄明州田园诗般的环境中聚会，参加堪萨斯城联邦储备银行的年度货币政策研讨会。对市场而言，重头戏往往是周五上午美联储主席的讲话。但除此之外，央行行长和学者们总要讨论一个主题。为了拉开今年会议的帷幕，我们采访了美联储主席兼首席经济学家杰弗里-施密德（Jeffrey Schmid）。【原文：It’s Jackson Hole time again, when the most prominent minds in monetary policy meet in an idyllic Wyoming setting for the Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City’s annual symposium on monetary policy. For markets, the main event tends to be the speech from the Fed Chairman on Friday morning. But beyond that, there’s always a theme that central bankers and academics are tasked to discuss. So to raise the curtain for this year’s event, we spoke with none other than Jeffrey Schmid, the president and CE】

item.title: 英国炼油厂前业主因财务违规被起诉
item.description: 英国林赛炼油厂的前所有者正面临英国的一项诉讼，原因是其现已倒闭的商业帝国在财务方面可能存在 "违规行为"。【原文：The former owner of the UK’s Lindsey oil refinery is facing a UK lawsuit over potential “irregularities” tied to the financial affairs of his now-failed business empire.】

item.title: 马斯克依靠人工智能为 X 的广告业务注入活力
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）将报道埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）数月来首次公开讨论其社交媒体网站 X 的业务。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner reports on Elon Musk’s first public discussion in months on the business of his social media site, X.】

item.title: 政治风云笼罩美联储年度研讨会
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们关注美联储杰克逊霍尔年度会议的政治背景。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at the political backdrop to the Fed’s annual Jackson Hole gathering. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 关税威胁美国圣诞装饰品行业
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税令美国节日装饰品行业的圣诞节变得 "蓝色"。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariffs are making it a blue Christmas for the US holiday decorations industry.】

item.title: 疯狂空置 "迫使波士顿业主质疑估值
item.description: 坎比兹-沙巴齐（Kambiz Shahbazi）说，由于科维德-19 对市场造成的破坏以及由此导致的租户外流，他在波士顿的四栋办公楼的价值直线下降。【原文：Kambiz Shahbazi says the value of his four Boston office buildings has tumbled because of the damage inflicted on the market by Covid-19 and the resulting exodus by tenants.】

item.title: Blackstone 为 Aligned 数据中心举债超过 10 亿美元
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 正在将 Aligned Data Centers 的债务融资额提高到 10 亿美元以上，因为私人借贷机构继续向支持人工智能的数据中心注入资金。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is increasing a debt facility for Aligned Data Centers to more than $1 billion as private lenders continue to pour capital into data centers supporting artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 波音公司正在洽谈向中国出售多达 500 架飞机的事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，波音公司正朝着与中国敲定一项多达500架飞机的销售协议迈进，这项交易将结束自美国总统唐纳德-特朗普2017年最后一次访华以来的销售荒。【原文：Boeing Co. is heading closer toward finalizing a deal with China to sell as many as 500 aircraft, according to people familiar with the matter, a transaction that would end a sales drought that stretches back to US President Donald Trump’s last visit in 2017.】

item.title: 诺和诺德业绩下滑，增长前景黯淡，丹麦消费者情绪低落
item.description: 丹麦消费者信心降至三个月来的最低点，诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）股价暴跌给强劲的劳动力市场和较高的购买力蒙上了阴影。【原文：Danish consumer confidence slipped to a three-month low, with Novo Nordisk A/S’s share plunge overshadowing a robust labor market and higher purchasing power.】

item.title: 印度经纪商 Avendus 因股票销售失败而陷入困境
item.description: 印度经纪商 Avendus Spark 因在出售 Clean Science & Technology Pvt.【原文：Indian broker Avendus Spark is under fire after botching a share sale of Clean Science & Technology Pvt., in what could be one of the country’s biggest fat-finger mistakes in years.】

item.title: 杰克逊霍尔会议前美国债券交易员关注一系列经济数据
item.description: 在一系列经济数据和美联储杰克逊霍尔会议（Jackson Hole）于周四晚些时候开幕之前，美国国债结束了连续两天的涨势。【原文：US Treasuries snapped two days of gains ahead of a flurry of economic data and the Federal Reserve’s gathering at Jackson Hole, which kicks off later Thursday.】

item.title: 印度承诺继续购买俄罗斯石油
item.description: 印度承诺继续购买俄罗斯石油，但有一个前提条件。【原文：India pledged — with a caveat — to keep buying Russian oil, a step that would preserve a vital market for Moscow’s barrels.】

item.title: 德国第二季度工资增长大幅加快
item.description: 根据德国联邦银行的数据，德国第二季度的工资增长跳升，尽管最近达成的协议表明未来的增长幅度会降低。【原文：German wage growth jumped in the second quarter, though recent agreements suggest lower increases going forward, according to the Bundesbank.】

item.title: 鲍威尔杰克逊霍尔讲话成为关注焦点，基本金属走低
item.description: 由于市场在等待美联储在杰克逊霍尔的会议，大多数基本金属走低，这次会议可能会在 9 月份的政策会议之前提供有关央行想法的线索。【原文：Most base metals edged lower as the market awaits the Federal Reserve’s gathering at Jackson Hole, which may offer clues about the central bank’s thinking ahead of its September policy meeting.】

item.title: 关税导致圣诞装饰品价格上涨
item.description:
对于提前数月订购人造圣诞树和装饰品的行业来说，较高的税率已经增加了数百万美元的意外支出

。【原文：

Higher levies already added millions of dollars in unexpected expenses in a sector that orders artificial trees and ornaments months ahead of time

】

item.title: 科技股下跌是大涨后交易员紧张的象征
item.description:
橡树公司的霍华德-马克斯（Howard Marks）说，股票正处于泡沫的 "早期"。【原文：

Oaktree’s Howard Marks says stocks are “in the early days” of a bubble.

】

item.title: 南非将启用 15 年来首个地下金矿
item.description: 南非将启用 15 年来首个新的地下金矿--这对于一个曾经是世界上最大贵金属生产国的国家来说，是一件越来越罕见的事情。【原文：South Africa is set to open its first new underground gold mine in 15 years – an increasingly rare event for a country that was once the world’s largest producer of the precious metal.】

item.title: 高盛交易员称现在是逢低买入动量股的时候了
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Sharp losses in high-flying momentum stocks may present a dip-buying opportunity if history is any guide, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s trading desk.】

item.title: 中石化上半年利润因油价下跌而下滑
item.description: 由于油价下跌、部分产品产量减少以及利润率下降，中国最大的炼油企业中石化上半年利润下滑。【原文：Sinopec posted a slump in first-half profit as declining oil prices, lower output of some products, and weaker margins combined to hurt China’s biggest refiner.】

item.title: 外资买入日本股票创 11 年之最，需求有望增加
item.description: 随着基准指数屡创新高，上周海外投资者抢购日本股票的数量创下 11 年来的最高纪录，一些市场参与者押注股票需求将保持强劲。【原文：Overseas investors snapped up the most Japanese stocks last week in 11 years as benchmark indexes ascended to record highs, and some market participants are betting that demand for shares will stay strong.】

item.title: 飓风艾琳扰乱了欧洲的天气和预测
item.description: 飓风艾琳正在搅乱计算机模型，使预报员、分析师和交易商对下周欧洲各地的高温、大风和风暴前景的准确性产生怀疑。【原文：Hurricane Erin is muddling computer models and making forecasters, analysts and traders question the accuracy of the outlook for heat, wind and storms across Europe next week.】

item.title: 人工智能增长强劲，瓜子二手车宣布特别股息
item.description: 在人工智能工具的强劲增长推动盈利超出预期后，瓜子二手车宣布派发特别股息。【原文：Kuaishou Technology declared a special dividend after strong growth of its AI tools propelled earnings ahead of expectations.】

item.title: 亚洲炼油商进一步寻求原油，石油市场面临供应过剩问题
item.description: 亚洲炼油商一直在寻找比他们通常的中东供应商更远的地方的原油，但这一更加多样化的战略并没有搅动正在为供应过剩做准备的市场。【原文：Asian oil refiners have been hunting for crude from further afield than their usual suppliers in the Middle East, but this more diversified strategy isn’t stirring a market that’s bracing for a glut.】

item.title: 投资者聚焦杰克逊霍尔，新兴市场资产窄幅波动
item.description: 新兴市场货币和股票窄幅震荡，投资者期待杰克逊霍尔会议提供有关央行政策路径的线索。【原文：Emerging-market currencies and equities traded in a narrow range as investors looked ahead to the Jackson Hole meetings for clues on central bank policy paths.】

item.title: 韩国限制外国人在首尔购房
item.description: 韩国对外国人在大首尔地区购买房产实行了新的限制，这是韩国抑制房价的最新举措。【原文：South Korea has introduced new restrictions on foreign property purchases in the greater Seoul area, its latest effort to curb housing prices.】

item.title: 特朗普试图通过罢免丽莎-库克赢得美联储理事会多数席位
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统推翻美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）的竞选活动如果成功，将使他有机会在美国中央银行的七人理事会中获得多数席位，从而对美国中央银行施加更大的影响。【原文：President Donald Trump’s campaign to oust Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook, if successful, would give him the opportunity to exert more influence over the US central bank by securing a majority on its seven-member board of governors.】

item.title: 比特币交易员在鲍威尔杰克逊霍尔讲话前惶恐不安
item.description: 随着交易员们为美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周五在杰克逊霍尔研讨会上发表的备受关注的讲话做好准备，数字资产正在失去优势。【原文：Digital assets are losing ground as traders brace for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s closely watched address at the Jackson Hole Symposium on Friday.】

item.title: DeepSeek 在代理人工智能领域推出超越旗舰产品的模型
item.description: DeepSeek 推出了一款旧机型的升级版，并称其在关键基准测试中超越了开创性的 R1，使这家中国初创公司在业界等待其下一款旗舰产品时仍能保持领先地位。【原文：DeepSeek unveiled an update to an older model that it says surpasses the seminal R1 on key benchmarks, keeping the Chinese startup in the game while the industry awaits its next flagship offering.】

item.title: 折价大宗交易后日本第一三共公司股价下跌
item.description: 日本制药公司第一三共公司（Daiichi Sankyo Co.【原文：Daiichi Sankyo Co. shares dropped the most in three months following a series of discounted block trades in the Japanese pharmaceutical company.】
